Desc.entry: Norah Rogerson provides 3 illustrated talks on art related subjects. Her subjects are: Sheffield Walkabout - experiences associated with the illustration and production of a book on Sheffield, with 72 drawings; Sheffield Canal Basin (The Pleasures and Pains of Painting on Site) - 90 paintings of dereliction and regeneration of the Basin, a talk with slides, prints and cards; Textiles, Fabric and Thread (embroidery) - the origins of designs for working with these materials, and inspiration from nature as source material when designing for the applied arts, jewellery and silver. Books, mounted prints and postcards are for sale. Fee charged. Qualifications - ATD.

Pubs.entry: Sheffield Walkabout (illustrated), The Attercliffe History Trail (illustrated)
